original_text: Now this was the manner in former time in Israel concerning redeeming and concerning changing, for to confirm all things; a man plucked off his shoe, and gave it to his neighbour: and this was a testimony in Israel.
korean_text: 옛적 이스라엘 중에는 모든 것을 무르거나 교환하는 일을 확정하기 위하여 사람이 그의 신을 벗어 그의 이웃에게 주더니 이것이 이스라엘 중에 증명하는 전례가 된지라

sentences.original_text: Now this was the manner in former time in Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘에는 예전에 다음과 같은 관습이 있었으니
친척의 권리를 행사하거나 물건을 바꿀 때에

sentences.original_text: a man plucked off his shoe
and gave it to his neighbour
and this was a testimony in Israel
